<Text: The Mexican Spitfires:  The original lineup consisted of Price Conlan on drums, Stephen McCowage on lead guitar, Tim O'Reilly on bass and vocals, Michael Quinlan on rhythm guitar and vocals.>
Triplets:<The Mexican Spitfires
3:
--------------------
Text: The Mexican Spitfires:  They recorded two extended plays, "Lupe Velez" (1988) and "Elephant" (1990); however, they had disbanded late in 1989.
